amendment.description: To improve authorities under the alternative authority for acquisition and improvement of military housing.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 3430 proposed by Senator Warner. (consideration: CR S7152-7160; text: CR S7156) To improve authorities under the alternative authority for acquisition and improvement of military housing.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3430 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3430 proposed by Senator Warner.
